alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier and western Hendry Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orangetree to 6 miles east of Felda. Movement was north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Felda, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Keri, Sunniland, Bunker Hill and Lake Trafford. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
